ygData.subject: Re: Can you enchant stacks or Silver at Once?
ygData.msgSnippet: I haven t been able to do stacks, but if you cast the spell it will automatically pick a bar from your inventory, just be careful to put the enchanted bar back
ygData.messageBody:
I haven't been able to do stacks, but if you cast the spell it will
automatically pick a bar from your inventory, just be careful to put the
enchanted bar back before you cast it again, or you will lose a bar.

Fiera Mindbender [BAD]
Erudite Enchanter-Xegony
.
----- Original Message -----
From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 11, 1999 4:06 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Can you enchant stacks or Silver at Once?


> From: Charles Adams <sirkal@...>
>
> Not yet 16th so I was wondering if you can enchant an entire stack of
> silver at once, or if you have to do it 1 bar at a time?
>
> Charles
